result.arabic_text: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا وَرُفَٰتًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ خَلۡقٗا جَدِيدٗا
result.translation: Ababangikanyamana bavuze bamirira kure izuka ry’ibiremwa, bati: “Aho rero nitwahwera tugacika amagufa yabunzwe akabora, burya tuzosubizwa ubuzima kandi, duheze tuzuke ku musi w’izuka!”.
